_source.short_desc: Proxyclick enables companies to manage visitor, employee and contractor flows across locations, while staying secure and compliant.
_source.long_desc: Proxyclick enables leading companies to manage visitor, employee, and contractor flows across locations while staying secure and compliant. The cloud-based solution offers unlimited usage per location, tailored smart flows, an unrivaled user experience, deep access control and software integrations, and advanced security, safety, and privacy features. It is supported by an international industry-leading customer success team. Free trial available.
_source.pricing_details:
Proxyclick offers a must-have starter pack with customizable add-on packages available for an additional cost. Proxyclick offer unlimited visitors, unlimited hosts, and unlimited kiosks.
 
Essential: $100 per month per location. For companies looking to get up and running quickly with essential visitor management and return-to-work capabilities. 

Premium: $300 per month per location. Our most popular plan. Recommended for companies with more complex visitor, employee, or contractor workflows seeking a fully integrated future-proof experience. 

Enterprise: for global, enterprise deployments. Our most comprehensive, all-inclusive offering. Contact us at sales@proxyclick.com for a quote. 

Check the full list of features on proxyclick.com/pricing!
_source.target_audience: Global enterprise companies looking to secure their buildings and making visitor processes more efficient. Ideally suited for corporations with multiple locations.

category_features.name: Alerts/Notifications
category_features.definition: Alerts/notifications within the system

category_features.name: Badge Management
category_features.definition: Create, manage, and print wearable badges with attendee information

category_features.name: Document Management
category_features.definition: Collect, upload, store, and share all documents in a centralized location making it easier for everyone involved to access information

category_features.name: ID Scanning
category_features.definition: Scan, record and validate an ID barcode.

category_features.name: Pre-Registration
category_features.definition: Allow users to manage pre-registration formalities for the business

category_features.name: Registration Management
category_features.definition: Make a list of and register attendees for an event

category_features.name: Self Check-in/Check-out
category_features.definition: Allow visitors to perform check-in by themselves.

category_features.name: Visitor Tracking
category_features.definition: Track visitor in-time, out-time, and purpose of visits.

category_features.name: Watch List
category_features.definition: Match visitors against a "watch list" and notify security staff of their presence.

related_products.short_desc: Visitor management for the modern workplace. Sine goes beyond to create a frictionless check-in journey for your visitors
related_products.features:
Complete workplace software for managing visitors, contractors, staff, students & couriers.  Visitors "check-in" on the iPad or using their smart phone, hosts can pre-register guests in advance and get notified via SMS, email or the Sine app on visitor arrival.
Trusted by JLL, Vodafone, GE, Comcast, DHL, Qantas and thousands of organizations globally. 24/7 Global support | Robust Integrations | Badge Printing | Customizable Branding | Emergency Alerts | Flexible Plans & Pricing

related_products.short_desc: Envoy Visitors creates a warm welcome for guests while safeguarding people, property, and ideas.
related_products.features: Envoy Visitors creates a warm welcome for guests while safeguarding people, property, and ideas. Envoy Protect confirms everyone walking through your door is healthy with a health screen before they leave home, touchless sign-in, capacity limits, and contact tracking. Envoy makes it easy to print badges, sign legal documents, grant wifi access, and notify hosts.

related_products.short_desc: Try the only visitor management system to offer two-way SMS, email, and Slack communication, as well as button-based visitor workflows.
related_products.features: Bring stability to your evolving office with our intuitive and versatile visitor management solution. The app is used by thousands of businesses around the globe, from offices with just a few employees to those over 50,000. Whether you are looking for a simple visitor logging system to track your visitor traffic, or require a fully configurable, two-way communication system with badge printing, The Receptionist for iPad can solve your specific office needs. We now offer contactless check-in!

related_products.short_desc: Operate your business safely with a secure, contactless sign in solution that manages your visitors, employees, deliveries and desks.
related_products.features: The world's easiest flexible workplace sign in system, to manage visitors, staff, deliveries and desks. Featuring visitor and employee screening questions, instant alert notifications, contact tracing at the touch of a button, remote working, visitor ID badges, a dedicated employee companion app and more. Our world-class customer care has an average response time of under 2 minutes. Truly unbeatable.

related_products.short_desc: Traction Guest's low-code, enterprise sign-in visitor management solution offers health screening, risk alerting and more.
related_products.features:
Traction Guest helps organizations with sign-in enterprise solutions to ensure the safety and security of employees and visitors.

Traction Guest provides a low-code tool to secure, manage and govern an entire cycle of visitor operations with a visitor management system (VMS) that makes welcoming your employees and visitors, as seamless as can be.

We provide the most advanced health & safety controls, critical outreach and alerting solutions, as well as, analytics and auditing functionality.

related_products.short_desc: The global leader in facility and visitor management for complex enterprises.
related_products.features:
Deployed across more than 5,000 sites worldwide, iLobby powers complex work environments by optimizing and automating key facility processes to achieve regulatory compliance, enforce safety protocols, and drive site security requirements.

The iLobby platform is supported by robust reporting, turnkey onboarding, and extensive configurability that ensures maximum impact in complex and regulated industries.

related_products.short_desc: Sign In App is a secure and flexible solution for visitor management, staff  & contractor sign in and desk and meeting room booking.
related_products.features: Sign In App is the smart and flexible way to sign in staff, visitors & contractors on-site or remotely. Contactless sign in, occupancy alerts, contact tracing, evacuations and deliveries are included as standard, as well as unlimited sign ins, support and data security options. Pre-register, print badges, notify hosts, sign policies/NDAs, play videos and tap in with our RFID reader. Join millions signing in each month and try the world's fastest growing visitor management app free for 15 days.

related_products.short_desc: Appointment Scheduling Software Built To Solve The Complex Needs of The Enterprise.
related_products.features:
Setster enterprise online appointment scheduling tool and rest based API empowers businesses in any industry to accept appointments online, streamline processes, optimize resources and convert leads. 

Setster's scheduling engine is built on a rest-based API that is easily deployed, highly secure and scalable for growth. You can schedule appointments, remotely manage settings and data, and connect Setster within any workflow. Trusted by large enterprise and fortune 500 companies.

related_products.short_desc: Teamgo helps your workplace stay safe with a fully customizable QR code sign-in system for use with iPad kiosks or smart phones apps.
related_products.features:
Teamgo visitor management is the perfect cloud solution for your workplace's needs. We provide you tools to manage visitor and employee arrivals with options to screen for safety and security.

Keep compliant and request forms and documents prior to arrivals, issue QR codes for contactless sign-in and keep your workplaces safe from critical events before they arrive.

The all in one web dashboard provides live visitor reporting and tools to manage your records and private data.

related_products.short_desc: Next generation visitor management, using the latest hybrid-cloud mobile technology to accurately control visitor access in real-time.
related_products.features: Gate Sentry is the next generation in visitor management! Cloud based mobile applications link hosts directly to security and eliminate outdated paper logs and expensive hardware. Hosts manage their own guest list in real-time and receive automatic visitor arrival notifications, providing the most accurate visitor tracking available. Using hybrid-cloud technology, Gate Sentry even works without power or internet connectivity ... truly the next generation in visitor management!

similar_products.short_desc: Make a great first impression and have peace of mind with Identity management that safeguards and streamlines your front desk.
similar_products.features: With more flexibility in workflow and deployments than anyone else in the market, HID Visitor Management Solutions partners with you to fit your organization and timeline. Create a great first impression and reduce visitor wait times, all while preventing piggybacking and security breaches. Ensure correct access provisions for every identity type on every visit - at the front desk or through an automated self-service check-in, reducing operational burdens on front desk staff.

similar_products.short_desc: iPad-enabled, simple, modern and fast visitor management for your visitors, customers, contractors and employees to sign in
similar_products.features:
iPad-enabled, simple, modern and fast visitor management for your visitors, customers, contractors and employees to sign in and sign out. 
Features - iPad based sign in/out, Web Dashboard, Realtime host notifications, instant badge printing, facial recognition, free version, out of the box integrations and many more.

similar_products.short_desc: Keep your office safe and secure. Allow visitors to check in, sign NDAs, and print badges on entry. Save time by pre-registering guests
similar_products.features:
Let your visitors pre-register, check in, visit, and depart your workplace with ease. Provide a smooth, flawless visitor experience from start to finish with Eden's visitor management software.

Eden makes visitor management quick, easy, and efficient. Thanks to integration with popular workplace apps like Slack and email, your teams can register, prescreen, and welcome their guests seamlessly.

similar_products.short_desc: A digital queue management system that helps you provide memorable visitor experiences and get real-time data insights.
similar_products.features:
Save your customers from the frustration of waiting and crowded lobbies.

Qminder is a cloud-based queue management system that helps service locations deliver superior waiting experience. With Qminder's SMS functionality, you can stay in touch with your customers even as they are checking in remotely.

similar_products.short_desc: Know precisely who is on campus; screen entrants; confirm students are released to approved guardians; and reduce COVID-19's spread.
similar_products.features: Raptor Visitor Management software enables schools to know precisely who is on campus. The system screens for sex offenders, ensures you're releasing students to approved guardians, and alerts staff of custody issues. Complete sign-in/out history is recorded, enabling district-wide reporting and facilitation of contact tracing. The software can be run on Raptor Kiosks or district-provided hardware. Over 35,000 K-12 schools use Raptor Visitor Management.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Facility Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Facility Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Facility Management software enables organizations to more effectively administer facility and plant assets. Details such as building layouts, assets, employees, and square footage are recorded and made readily accessible. Facility Management solutions allow for easy access to drawings and schematics, room scheduling, preventative maintenance tasks, work orders, and records for equipment including lighting, security, HVAC, elevators, and fire alarms. Facility Management software is related to Fixed Asset Management software, Building Maintenance software, Equipment Maintenance software, HVAC software, Maintenance Management software, EHS Management software, Visitor Management software, and Scheduling software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Identity Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Identity Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Identity Management software provides organizations with the tools for managing employee access to a variety of corporate resources, physical as well as virtual. This software commonly offers single sign-on facilitation as a feature. Identity Management software enables policy-based access governance with an option to selectively revoke access from any given employee. For related software solutions see Compliance software, Risk Management software, and Employee Monitoring software.

related_products.short_desc: Eventbrite provides cost-effective, innovative registration software to help businesses set up, manage, and sell out events online.
related_products.features: Eventbrite provides cost-effective registration software to help businesses manage and promote their events online-while helping people discover events that fuel their passions. From backyard barbecues to classes to conferences to world-renowned film and music festivals, Eventbrite houses events of all shapes and sizes. As one of today's fastest-growing registration platforms, Eventbrite delivers innovative technology and low fees-and if your event is free, so is Eventbrite. Learn more.

related_products.short_desc: GoTo Webinar powers millions of webinars each year and is now part of GoTo Connect, all-in-one communications software built for SMBs.
related_products.features: GoTo Webinar is trusted by more customers than any other online webinar solution and powers millions of webinars each year. Whether you use webinars for marketing, training, or corporate communications, GoTo Webinar puts the fun back into webinars with reliable technology that's super simple to use. Get the features, integrations and analytics you need to engage your audience and make personal connections that drive your business.

related_products.short_desc: Cloud-based software with event app, event registration, event marketing, and event management for in-person/virtual/hybrid events.
related_products.features:
Whova is an all-in-one event management solution that consists of an award winning event app, efficient online registration, powerful event marketing, and time-saving event management tools. 
Whova has won the Event Technology Award for 5 years in a row and has powered over 30,000 in-person and virtual/hybrid events for all kinds of organizations in over 100 countries, including American Express, Microsoft, Hilton, Lego, IKEA, L'Oreal, American Marketing Association, Harvard University, and NASA

related_products.short_desc: Smart, flexible, and powerful event registration system. Manage invitees, registrants, and even multiple events.
related_products.features:
Your events are unique. You need a registration system that can be tailored to your specific needs. Our rich feature set makes your small meetings easy and scales up to handle the largest user conferences.

Our event registration software is part of the most powerful event management platform on the market. So no matter the size or complexity of your events program, you'll have all the tools you need to succeed.

related_products.short_desc: Create a beautiful event website in minutes. Trusted by more than 300,000 people worldwide, including planners from Nike and MIT.
related_products.features:
Create a beautiful event website in minutes. 

Build an event website, collect registrations, sell tickets, send invites, track attendees, and promote your event online. Reliable and secure. 

Trusted by more than 500,000 people worldwide, including planners from Nike, MIT and Refinery29.

related_products.short_desc: Manage class scheduling and registration, billing and payments, communications, and reporting all from one convenient software online.
related_products.features: Developed by school owners, for school owners, iClassPro is the worlds best online class management software solution for class-based businesses. A subscription to iClassPro includes features for class and camp schedule, enrollment tracking, communications, accounts receivable, online registration, reporting and more. iClassPro has an amazing support team is available to help every step of the way.

related_products.short_desc: Eventzilla is an online event registration & marketing platform for virtual in-person and hybrid events.
related_products.features:
Eventzilla is a leading cloud-based event registration & marketing platform for in-person and virtual events. We make it easy for event organizers to create a beautiful, professional web presence to promote their events.

Works perfect for conferences, webinars, virtual events, fundraisers, classes, reunions, concerts, & sports events.

Eventzilla has everything you need to setup a custom event website, publish event schedule, process payments, manage attendee details and check-in easily.

related_products.short_desc: To create the most compelling event platform which powers organizations looking to scale using modern technology tools.
related_products.features: Showpass is a global leader in event technology, primary ticketing and distribution, and the mixed delivery (live, virtual and streamed) of experiences for tens of thousands of event hosts. Showpass provides access to global distribution and discovery channels including Facebook's native ticketing, Google Reserve, and a proprietary publishers network. Showpass creates solutions for complex events, large organizations, and high-volume event producers and is proud to serve millions of customers.

related_products.short_desc: Online registration and payment processing for any business. Manage registrations, online payments, and client management with Regpack.
related_products.features: Regpack is an online registration software that lets you create flexible registration processes with integrated payments, automatic email communication built-in, dynamic reporting and analytics, and more. Trusted by more than 7,000 organizations worldwide, our clients report an increase in registrations, revenue growth, and are more efficient in day-to-day management tasks. Learn more about how Regpack can help you and your team automate and streamline your onboarding and payment processes.

related_products.short_desc: Built by and for children's activity providers, Sawyer is activity management software for online scheduling, online payments and more.
related_products.features: Sawyer is an all-in-one software that allows educators to build custom class schedules and easily manage online registration, payment processing, parent communications and more. Our dedicated and top-rated support team provides training videos, hosted webinars, and business resources for educational leaders to bring our community together. Our software is flexibly priced to suit your business and requires no long term contracts.

related_products.short_desc: Apply empowers organizations to seamlessly collect, manage and review grant applications and drive better, faster funding decisions.
related_products.features: Move towards your mission, faster. Create a frictionless grantmaking process with SurveyMonkey Apply (formerly known as FluidReview). Seamlessly collect and review applications online, save time with robust automations, gain insights with powerful reports, and more. Special non-profit pricing is available.

Scan for attendance - Texting - Offer free or charge for courses - Track attendance, manage training, CEUs, credits and clock hours - Send out completion certificates - and more!

similar_products.short_desc: Hearty technology, lightweight package. We combine serious registration software with an event platform designed for regular humans.

We changed registration forever when we created an intuitive, customizable  platform that includes unlimited events + registrations for in-person, hybrid and virtual events. Our event registration also includes: unlimited logic for personalized reg pathways, fully responsive pages for laptops, tablets, and phones, free integrations (CRM, payments, etc), and drag & drop everything (or bring your own HTML).

similar_products.short_desc: A robust training and multi-class registration solution that works great with synchronous and asynchronous offerings for one flat fee.
similar_products.features: LearningStream is an online registration software that that automates the registration process and related tasks. Improve registration workflows and event tracking with customized tools that reduce manual tasks. Our software provides custom registration pages, reporting, automated email and text communications, integrations, and customized forms. Collect registration fees or deposits with our payment integrations. We even provide check-in features for attendance tracking. Learn more here!

Rated tops by Capterra!

similar_products.short_desc: Your Affordable, All-in-One Event Platform. Instant payouts, 24/7 live support. For only $1 per ticket plus 1% of the ticket sale.
similar_products.features: Create an end-to-end event experience, from ticket sales to event check in and even mobile donations. Accelevents event ticketing service fully integrates with its mobile silent auction offering. Use ticketing as a standalone, or combine the two! Ticketing costs only $1 per ticket + 1% of ticket sales (can be pushed to your ticket buyers), while silent auctions cost $99 per event + $1 per bidder.

similar_products.short_desc: The best registration for your virtual in-person event! RegFox gives you everything you need for .99 cents per attendee.
similar_products.features:
The best registration software for your event! 

RegFox is the most flexible and affordable registration system on the market today. Thousands of the worlds leading brands use RegFox for online registration software because it is simple, intuitive, and incredibly powerful. 

Get total branding control so the registration forms look like your organization, and at only 99-cent registration,  RegFox is packed with awesome features for virtual events and live events.

similar_products.short_desc: Say goodbye to long registration lines by selling everything from activities to merchandise online with a branded store that can stand-
similar_products.features: Say goodbye to long registration lines by selling everything from activities to merchandise online with a branded store that can stand-alone or fully integrate into your website. Engage your clients online by curating seamless online experiences that keep them coming back for more. Sell activities, memberships, drop-ins, private lessons, facility bookings, merchandise, and more online. Manage restrictions and in-store visibility based on age, gender, location, membership, skill, or more.

similar_products.short_desc: Whether hybrid, virtual or in-person, eShow provides the professional tools and web-based solutions necessary for event management team
similar_products.features:
Whether hybrid, virtual or in-person, eShow provides the professional tools and web-based solutions necessary for event management teams worldwide. Founded in 1996, eShow has helped Event Managers run thousands of events worldwide with tasks including registration, mobile apps, event websites, RFID, badge printing, abstract collection and so much more! 

When you choose the eShow product(s) that fit your needs, you tap into a powerful engine that no single-function supplier can hope to match.
